Producer: Sarah Brennan Kolb, Alan Oxman, Tara Summers, Ujon Tokarski, Teo Zagar
Production Co: General Store Films, Tal Vez Entertainment
Synopsis: A carpenter (Ujon Tokarski) struggles to move beyond his troubled past when he returns to his hometown to mend relationships and finds solace in building a log cabin by hand. His plans are complicated when he reunites with Sierra (Tara Summers), a woman with whom he shares a difficult past, and he is forced to reconcile his old life with his new one.
Title: Major Arcana
